name: chained-voting
author: GBS DACH Blockchain Taskforce
description: This project aims at leveraging the Hyperledger fabric-Blockchain to showcase a simple voting app (server).

scripts.stop: docker-compose down && docker rm dev-peer0.org.chained-voting.com-chaincode-v1 && docker rmi dev-peer0.org.chained-voting.com-chaincode-v1
